oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bible Way COGIC: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bible Way Church of Christ in God
Fieldnotes of Bible Way COGIC in Cleveland. Notes document the location of the church on Dooley St NE and provide a brief description of the building.
Located in Cleveland, Tennessee, Bible Way COGIC's church building dates back to 1960. According to fieldnotes, the building is "a good c. 1960 gable front brick building."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
Field notes
